original_text: They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would no doubt have continued with us: but they went out, that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us.
korean_text: 그들이 우리에게서 나갔으나 우리에게 속하지 아니하였나니 만일 우리에게 속하였더라면 우리와 함께 거하였으려니와 그들이 나간 것은 다 우리에게 속하지 아니함을 나타내려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: but they were not of us
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 우리 중 한 사람이 아니었습니다

sentences.original_text: for if they had been of us
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들이 만약 우리 중 한 사람이었다면

sentences.original_text: they would no doubt have continued with us
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 분명 우리와 함께 있었을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that they might be made manifest
that they were not all of us
